title: Rank
body:
Okay so im not a good league player or anything nor really bad. In the past 3 games in a row I literally have the worst matchmaking ever, 3 in a row 1 person AFK and we lose. Its either that or troll picks. At the moment I do not think the rank systems reflects a persons skill but instead on their luck in matchmaking. I think riot really need to change the matchmaking system AGAIN hopefully it would be better so we can actually climb. 

Anyone else also thinks the same?
